name: Marshtomp
description: The surface of MARSHTOMP’s body is enveloped by a thin, sticky film that enables it to live on land. This POKéMON plays in mud on beaches when the ocean tide is low.

abilities.name: Torrent
abilities.effect: When this Pokémon has 1/3 or less of its HP remaining, its water-type moves inflict 1.5× as much regular damage.
abilities.description: Ups WATER moves in a pinch.

abilities.name: Damp
abilities.effect: While this Pokémon is in battle, self destruct and explosion will fail and aftermath will not take effect.
